cat.lump.aq.wikilink.jwpl

Class LanguageConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.aq.wikilink.jwpl.LanguageConstants

  • public class LanguageConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    Includes the constant identifiers for Wikipedia labels in different languages.
    Many of the labels come from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Manual_of_Style/Layout and the corresponding articles in other languages
    Since:
    Feb 26 2014
    Version:
    0.2
    Author:
    alberto

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LanguageConstants()
      Opens the CONFIG_FILE and loads all the language constants for the available languages.
